channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Visual Studio 2026 Insiders is here!】Visual Studio 2026内部人员在这里！
item.description: 【Get ready –the first Insiders release of Visual Studio 2026 has arrived! In this new evolution of Visual Studio, we’re continuing our commitment to building the best integrated developer environment for C++ developers on Windows. [video src="" poster=""] Visual Studio 2026 features a fresh UI, f】准备好 - Visual Studio 2026的第一个内部人士发布！在这一新的Visual Studio演变中，我们继续致力于为Windows上的C ++开发人员建立最佳的集成开发人员环境。 [Video Src =“” Poster =“”] Visual Studio 2026具有新鲜的UI，F

item.title: 【Announcing .NET 10 Release Candidate 1】宣布.NET 10释放候选1
item.description: 【.NET 10 Release Candidate 1 is now available. This is our first of two release candidates which come with a go-live support license so you can confidently use this release for your production applications. This release of .NET 10 is supported in the new】.NET 10释放候选1现在可用。这是我们两个发行候选人中的第一个，该候选人带有Go-Live支持许可证，因此您可以自信地将此版本用于生产应用程序。新的10版在新的版本中支持

item.title: 【.NET and .NET Framework September 2025 servicing releases updates】.NET和.NET框架2025年9月服务发布更新
item.description: 【Welcome to our combined .NET servicing updates for September 2025. Let's get into the latest release of .NET & .NET Framework, here is a quick overview of what's new in our servicing releases: Security improvements .NET and .NET Framework has been refreshed with the latest update as of September 05, 2025. This update contains no】欢迎使用2025年9月的总和.NET维修更新。让我们进入.NET＆.NET Framework的最新版本，以下是我们维修版本中的新事物的快速概述：安全改进：NET和.NET框架，并刷新了最新的更新。

item.title: 【Visual Studio 2026 Insiders is here!】Visual Studio 2026内部人员在这里！
item.description: 【Visual Studio 2026 Insiders is here - and it marks one of the most ambitious steps forward we’ve taken with the IDE. This release brings AI woven directly into the developer workflow, performance improvements that reset expectations for speed at enterprise scale, and a modern design that makes the environment feel lighter】Visual Studio 2026内部人员在这里 - 它标志着我们与IDE一起采取的最雄心勃勃的步骤之一。此版本将AI直接带入开发人员的工作流程，重置对企业规模速度期望的性能的改进以及使环境变得更轻的现代设计

item.title: 【A suggestion to people who assign nicknames to meeting rooms】向将昵称分配给会议室的人的建议
item.description: 【It is common for Microsoft buildings to assign nicknames to meeting rooms to make them easier to remember. Instead of "We will be in room 1728" you can say "We will be in the Magellan room." The new Microsoft Building 3 has a series of meeting rooms labeled 1.3A through 1.3E. (The number 1.3 means "first floor, zone 3.") These meeti】Microsoft建筑物通常将昵称分配给会议室以使它们更容易记住。您可以说“我们将在麦哲伦房间里”，而不是“我们将在1728室”。新的Microsoft建筑物3有一系列标有1.3A至1.3E的会议室。 （数字1.3的意思是“一楼，区域3”）

item.title: 【Building a Runtime JAR inspector in 10 hours】在10个小时内建立运行时罐检查器
item.description: 【Last Friday I was reviewing our backlog items in the Java Engineering Group, and found an idea we had when Log4Shell happened. To this day, there is still no main stream solution to "find in production where a given JAR is being used".】上周五，我在Java工程组中审查了我们的积压项目，并在Log4shell发生时发现了一个想法。直到今天，仍然没有主流解决方案可以“在使用给定罐子的生产中找到”。

item.title: 【Change to data visibility for Microsoft Graph callRecords APIs in GCC High and DoD】更改Microsoft Graph CallRecords API的数据可见性
item.description: 【As a continuation of changes previously announced for global customers, we will be making cha】作为以前宣布全球客户的变更的延续，我们将制作CHA

item.title: 【Why didn't Windows 95 simply special-case the laptops that locked up when it executed the HLT instruction?】为什么Windows 95不简单地执行 HLT 指令时锁定的笔记本电脑？
item.description: 【The 80386 HLT instruction tells the CPU to stop executing instructions until a hardware interrupt occurs. This was traditionally the instruction performed by the operating system when it had no work to do, allowing the CPU to go into a low-power mode. (In modern times, operating systems use other instructions like MWAIT】80386 HLT指令告诉CPU停止执行说明，直到发生硬件中断为止。传统上，这是操作系统没有工作要做的指令，允许CPU进入低功率模式。 （在现代，操作系统使用其他说明，例如MWAIT

item.title: 【The case of the crash on a null pointer even though we checked it for null】即使我们检查了null的零件，坠机指针上的崩溃案件即
item.description: 【A colleague was investigating a crash. The stack at the point of the crash looks like this: contoso!winrt::impl::consume_Windows_Foundation_Collections_IVectorView< winrt::Windows::Foundation::Collections::IVectorView<int>, int>::Size+0x30 contoso!winrt::Contoso::implementation::Widget::】一位同事正在调查撞车事故。坠机点的堆栈看起来像这样：contoso！winrt :: inmp.:: councume_windows_foundation_collections_ivectorview <winrt :: Windows :: Foundation :: Foundation :: collections :: collections :: IvectorView <int> <int>，int>，int>，int>，int>，size+0x30 contoso！

item.title: 【What’s New in vcpkg (August 2025)】VCPKG的新功能（2025年8月）
item.description: 【This blog post summarizes changes to the vcpkg package manager as part of the 2025.08.27 registry release as well as changes to vcpkg documentation throughout August. There were no tool chang】该博客文章总结了VCPKG软件包管理器的更改，作为2025.08.27注册表版本的一部分，以及整个8月的VCPKG文档的更改。没有工具chang
